alert.note: Alert for Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:12AM EST until February 18 at 9:48PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Morristown TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee...Virginia... Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Hancock and Scott Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River near Speers Ferry VA. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, County Road 627 just downstream floods. At 21.0 feet, One or two houses are threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 20.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM EST.
